website_summaries.verdict: This highly-rated kitchen mat offers buyers a variety of neutral colors and lengths.
pros: This non-toxic product is 60% thicker than other comparable models
Proven to reduce fatigue and comfort
Showcases no-curl edges and stay-flat technology, ensuring your mat keeps its shape
cons: Many customers complained of ugly creases along the mat

customer_reviews.title: It's a comfortable mat, but the "Flatiron" color is most certainly ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a comfortable mat, but the "Flatiron" color is most certainly NOT grey as other reviewers stated. It's a brownish color. Here's a photo of the 72" x 20" Flatiron mat on my grey tile floor. Wish I would have bought the black color instead.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Scott

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great afte 2 years of constant use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat just over 2 years ago. It is very comfortable. It has a nice cushioned feel when I stand on it. Most importantly it has last well for the last 2 years. It is still in good condition and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: cleans easily with a mop and stays in one place
customer_reviews.text: Got this mat for my kitchen, it's VERY comfy to stand, cleans easily with a mop and stays in one place. It's lighter than I expected but that's a good thing when cleaning the floor underneath. No wrinkles out of the box. The Mocha color is great, it's modern and discreet and fits in better that I think a black or white one would. If you stand on one heel it will make an indent in the mat but it goes away once you move. At this early stage I'm very pleased with this item!
customer_reviews.author: aceofbase

customer_reviews.title: Great options and product.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement for another one I had purchased at Sam's. They no longer sell them so I searched many sites to find another. This company had the most variety for size and quality. It was a product worth investigating because it is exactly what I wanted. The only one I could find in the 4 foot length and also a variety of colors. I cook quite a bit and have a travertine floor and bad back. This helps relieve stress from the hard floor. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MOMOC

customer_reviews.title: Enduring quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure which is more amazing, this product or the delivery service! I bought 2 of these for my mother a couple of years ago, she loves them....and they still look brand new. She now 'winters' in Alabama and wanted the same mats for her kitchen here. I ordered them Saturday afternoon, the fed -ex driver rang the doorbell at 0800 Monday morning to deliver the mats. The construction and quality are exactly the same as my previous purchase. These mats are much ,more cushiony and comfortable than the higher priced mat my spouse bought for me...I'm just waiting for it to wear out so I can get one of these mats for myself!
customer_reviews.author: KathyZ

customer_reviews.title: best standing mat I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best standing mat I've ever owned. I bought a small one for in front of the sink when I was doing dishes, and my wife stole it for in front of the stove. Rather than fight over it, I just bought a larger one for in front of the stove and counters next to it. We both love them, and several friends have bought them after standing on ours.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon W

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The right size for my weird space (long rectangle with good width). The support for my back and feet using this mat is superior and remarkable. I can cook in my slippers for a few hours and not get a backache - unlike using inferior mats previously.
customer_reviews.author: Citi-Zen

customer_reviews.title: Quality product-very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality mat. Thick, but safe with the beveled edges. Memory foam is very comfortable to stand on with my tile floor. It does not wrinkle or move. I would have liked to have the next largest size (26x48) but it was out of stock in the color I wanted (creme). This one is in front of my kitchen sink. If the larger size becomes available, I will move this one in front of the stove and order the larger one for the sink.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Bossom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money- great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat. This is the 3rd one I have bought for my kitchen and I love them. I have really, really hard tile floor and standing on these mats is the only way my feet and legs can cook dinner. I also put one at the bottom of my 5 step tile stairs just in case my 2 year old happens to fall down (heaven forbid) as I feel that it will protect him from any serious injury. Also, the mats wear fantastic! I have had one of these mats for 2 years and they wipe off awesome and retain their shape no matter what. Incredible! You will never need to buy another mat/rug again!
customer_reviews.author: My 2 cents

customer_reviews.title: Delivers as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mat for several months now and am satisfied with it. It lays nice and flat (after about a week to relax). It delivers a good amount of cushioning without becoming a trip hazard for me. The top is not showing signs of wear. The only downside is I was hoping for a redder color, given the name of "cinnamon". Meh...it's just a warm brown. Good price for a decent product, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mat - a month in. I stand for about 3 hours/day
customer_reviews.text: As someone who does a part-time standing desk, I got this mat to be able to slowly get an idea of what that's like (since standing on the floor alone was killing me). I've seen people here complain that it's not enough support, but I wonder how many folks' bodies are also just getting accustomed to standing up for hours at a time. Anyway, in the bigger picture, I'm probably just above a minimal user... so if you're going to use this for 5 or 6 hours+ per day, you should read over some of the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Adphawkit

customer_reviews.title: It has been in a high traffic area in our kitchen (sink/stove) and definitely made spending hours standing there more comfortabl
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these seven years ago, and we now have to throw it out due to cracks all over the surface. It has been in a high traffic area in our kitchen (sink/stove) and definitely made spending hours standing there more comfortable. I am re-ordering the same mat. I wish the old one hadn't gone kaput, but seven years seems like a reasonable lifespan under the circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia fentriss

customer_reviews.title: but more importantly it's super-cushion-y and my feet love standing on it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat because I do a lot of standing in one place on a concrete floor. It hasn't bothered me before, but recently I started experiencing pain in one knee and an increased feeling of fatigue in my legs. This mat arrived yesterday and it's already making a difference. It's edges are sloped so there's less chance of tripping, but more importantly it's super-cushion-y and my feet love standing on it. I stand about 6 hours a day, and look forward to experiencing the benefits of this mat for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone that has to work and stand in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one. The first one is still going strong after 4 years of use. Great for anyone that has to work and stand in one spot. It doesn't really feel like anything I'm using it, but I can feel the difference in my knees and joints the following morning and day. Watch my unboxing video.
customer_reviews.author: RC Beach Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Feels Like Walking/Standing on a Cloud
customer_reviews.text: I spend hours on the weekend cooking several dishes for dinners during the week. Before I purchased this mat I would have to lay down after all that cooking because my heels and the balls of my feet were killing me from the pressure of standing all that time. Now while cooking my feet are well-cushioned and they never hurt afterwards. The mat has a non-slip backing and spills clean up easily. I have moved twice since purchasing it and it is a cinch to pack up and still looks brand new. I highly recommend getting one or more for the areas where you spend a lot of time preparing food - in front of the counter, sink, stove.
customer_reviews.author: Erika A.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This was not cheap so I have high expectations for this mat. It is at our kitchen sink so it will get a workout. It was packaged well and has flattened out in a few hours. Stepping on this with running shoes does not give you the memory foam effect you expect. I am sure this is mitigated by the cushioning of the running shoe. I stepped on it with my bare feet and there is definitely some cushioning going on. I am going to come back to this review in a few weeks and note if help us be more comfortable standing at the sink. The color and pattern is accurate to the pictures available on their web site.
customer_reviews.author: Voltaire

customer_reviews.title: Works great on tile floor for my bad back!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Color true. Great comfort to stand on in the kitchen while cooking. I purchase a total of 3 to go around my counters and island in a rather large kitchen. All 72" length. Good cushioning and very comparable to an older Gel Pro mat I had previously used. I like that there is just an imprint of a design and no cracks/cervices for food to get caught in. They are pretty easy to move or to clean around. I have a very bad back and feet. These mats work great in my kitchen with all tile floors.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Schiffbauer

customer_reviews.title: Quality comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Love this comfort mat in the kitchen... It definitely relieves foot and leg fatigue when cooking in the kitchen for a long period. It is definitely excellent quality and very durable. Cleans up without any effort. This is my second mat... just replaced after 7 years of daily use. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoLover

customer_reviews.title: I can cook for hours with comfy feet!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mat after an outing in Sonoma. My feet were killing me from several hours of walking and shopping, and it just felt so good to stand on this foam, which we found in a kitchen gadget store. It was a bit over-priced in the store, so when I got home, I found it on Amazon and ordered it immediately. We placed it in front of our sink/counter where I do most of my food prep, dish washing, etc. It has really made standing for long periods of time very comfortable. It also clean up very easily. If you have sore feet, this is a must have addition to your kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered another Imprint mat. I bought one in 2012 for my newly renovated kitchen and it has been great! I have had no problems with it; it lays flat and cushions very well on the wood floor. I recently bought another home with a tiled kitchen and getting another Imprint mat was on the top of my list. Great product and well-priced.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Revolutionizes your cooking/cleaning experience
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased this mat in two different sizes to cover the bulk of our countertop area. They make a WORLD of difference in standing for an extended time to cook, prep, or wash dishes. My neighbor recently came over and said "This thing is awesome." And is now buying one for herself. It is pricey, but worth it compared to what else is on the market. Here's hoping they last a long time. I give 5 stars, but wish it did stay in place a little better. I will be trying a rug gripper underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: I don't want to step off!
customer_reviews.text: This mat provides enormous comfort for my achy feet. My kitchen has concrete floors and the 48" mat is wide enough to provide coverage for my most busy kitchen areas (sink and adjacent counter). While in the kitchen, I don't want to step off this mat! It is an attractive, basket-weave surface and it lies completely flat. I love it! I would comment that the color is not what I expected. I expected 'cinnamon' to be a medium red-brown color. This mat is what I would call a dark chocolate color. It is very attractive, but not what I expected. Still, I am very, very pleased and recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona J

customer_reviews.title: Grandparent approved
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for our aging parents and they love them. It's comfortable for them when standing at the sink or stove for kitchen time. We've noticed that as they are getting older, they're cutting corners for comfort. Standing uncomfortably for an extra 5 minutes just wasn't happening. With these, they spend more time in the kitchen and eat healthier as they can take more time to prepare food and cleanup. I highly recommend and will be ordering a set for our sink and stove areas.
customer_reviews.author: DWilliams

customer_reviews.title: comfy comfy for the feets!
customer_reviews.text: So, I'm not using this in the kitchen or anything like most folks. I have this under my computer desk to rest my feet on! I am a medical transcriptionist and I use a foot pedal with my right foot. This keeps my foot at an angle and my heel digging into the floor. I have had some heel pain and I have heard of other MTs ending up with plantar fasciitis! Oh heck no! This little gem has kept me working in bare feet all summer with zero pain. I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Emily R. Gilley

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I noted that others said the had a "crease" that never went away and sure enough I got one too- but the comfort and size was good enough to not send it back. It has definitely made difference when standing to prepare Thanksgiving Dinner and washing all those dishes that didn't fit in the dishwasher- Wouldn't mind having it through out the house!!! lol!---- very cushy! Compared to what I saw in the brick and mortars- this is definitely a better purchase and would have given it 5 stars if that darn crease had disappeared!
customer_reviews.author: orchid

customer_reviews.title: Great Product With Some Wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: Based on all of the favorable reviews, I went with the Sublime over the other Gel brand. I'm very happy with my choice but the end of the mat that was rolled the tightest is still heavily wrinkled a month later. Overall, I would still recommend. 5-Star Update on 4/6/2013: I was thrilled to get an immediate response to my original review by Evelyn Balestrieri. She didn't hesitate to send out a replacement which further cemented Sublime as a top-notch company in my books. Thank You!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product in every way. High quality appearance, easy to clean, easy to move around if needed. Very comfortable to stand on, but not so thick that it's a tripping hazard. I like these pads so much that when I moved apartments, I moved the pads myself in my car to make sure they didn't get lost by the movers!
customer_reviews.author: M. Warren

customer_reviews.title: If you love to cook
customer_reviews.text: If you love to cook, this is an awesome pad for your legs! Fifteen years we bought 2 of there pads from Home Depot, same make .After 15years,they began split . We think that is awesome. So we bought two more, they are even better. These are great for your feet and legs.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice pad
customer_reviews.text: The pad in this is awesome! So comfortable and the tan looks nice on my tan tiles. The only problem is it doesn't stay in one place, it moves. It's kind of nice because I can just push it from my in front of the sink to in front of the cabinets while I cook, but a little annoying that it moves.
customer_reviews.author: Lovinmysunnylife

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, but surface material is thin!
customer_reviews.text: I use a standing desk at work and I have one of these mats. Before, standing in my shoes all day was really hurting my feet and joints. Admittedly, if I stand in one place too long, my feet do sink to the bottom...but that's just a reminder to myself that I have to keep moving! I loved it so much (purchased in cinnamon) that I got the full sized mat for my kitchen. Treat yourself well and get one. EDIT 12/9 I ordered in mid September. The surface material is ripped. Please be aware that you may have to be careful with the surface as it is quite thin.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Comfort mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat should be well received by anyone who has to stand in one place for extended periods of time. The mat has a beveled edge so that one does not trip on it. It relieves stress on legs from standing for long periods. My wife uses it for her work on fused glass. It's a winner. 1/5/15 Addendum. My wife was cleaning the mat with a vacuum cleaner and a piece of the plastic covering peeled off. Be warned, only clean this mat with a mop or a dust cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Cheely

customer_reviews.title: Not as resilient as it seems
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and received the mat just before Thanksgiving. The instructions say "Please do not to stand on the mat in "stilleto" type high heel shoes. These sharp heels can potentially damage the surface of the mat." My wife doesn't own a pair of stilletos, so this isn't an issue. A relative stood on the mat in loafer type shoes, rubber sole. Left indentions in the mat. Instructions said something about a crease that may be in the mat from shipping and that it would disappear in 48-72 hours. These indentions have now been there for a week. Also, mat moves slightly out of place on the floor. Returning the mat.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: What a relief on my feet!
customer_reviews.text: We just put in ceramic tiles in our kitchen and I was already having problems with the wood floor on my feet. This is such an improvement, my feet no longer give me problems when I'm doing dishes or cleaning up in the kitchen. My only regret is that I wish they sold it longer than 72- inches at the 20-inch width. I would recommend this to anyone that has problems standing too long in an area with hard floors, it's now like walking on a cloud. The cinnamon color works great with my terracotta tiles!
customer_reviews.author: P. Downey

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a smaller version of this mat last Nov. and liked it so much I just ordered the larger size. I put one in front of the stove and the other in front of the sink - they feel so good to stand on and keep my back from hurting with prolonged standing. The quality is very good. Spills wipe right up. The first mat still looks brand new after 6 months. Had no problems with wrinkles - they were both smooth upon arrival. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jean H

customer_reviews.title: Have a Standing Desk? You need this mat.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a standing desk at work for four months now and this mat is a lifesaver. While I do prioritize comfort over fashion in my shoes, I do draw the line somewhere and that means most of my flats are not particularly supportive (but they are cute!). This mat keeps my feet comfortable all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A E Iriana

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these matts at Costco for, I think, $40. This matt (the one I am now reviewing) is far superior. The foam is denser and, it seems, of a far higher quality. I ordered mine in beige, and the color is really very nice, maybe with a nearly imperceptible green hue. Everything about this matt speaks of high quality. If you spend a lot of time in the kitchen (for me, that means at least several hours a day), you might consider treating yourself to one of these matts. If you do, this is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Secret Santa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat because I have lower back problems and I also love to cook! I'd seen similar mats advertised and decided to give one a try...I am standing up quite a bit in the kitchen cooking and whatnot and was hoping it would help with the fatigue in my back. Well, it has been one of the best purchases I've ever made! This mat is very comfortable for a lot of standing and it cleans up easily. I'm ordering another one so I can have one in front of the sink and one in front of the stove!
customer_reviews.author: Diane I

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and looks
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these mats to protect the area under the kitchen sink and in front of the stovetop. They are great! The mocha colour is a kind of stone/tan, perhaps not quite my idea of mocha but the same colour as pictured. The edges stay down so there is no trip hazard, and there must be proper memory foam inside because your foot prints remain imprinted on the mat for a few seconds after moving away. Much more comfortable than standing on a hard floor.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a memory foam of support for ankle and foot arches
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly comfortable!!! Your bare feet sink into this mat and provide supreme support! I’ve had numerous ankle surgeries and this may is FAR superior to the others on the market I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Best and Most Comfortable Mat Ever
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased my third Imprint gel mat - highly recommend these for comfort, especially if you have bad feet/legs etc. and can't stand for long periods, and also to help prevent future problems! They are lightweight, unlike some other brands which are very heavy and cumbersome and aren't as comfortable. The lay flat, clean up with a damp cloth, show no signs of wear after heavy daily use and basically look as good now as when first purchased nearly two years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Potter

customer_reviews.title: Just got a bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before in other colors and no issues. When I received this one like usual the instructions state to wait a few days for the creases caused by being rolled up to disappear. I waited for four days and the creases didn't disappear. I contacted customer service and they promptly allowed me to return. I purchased in another color and no issues!
customer_reviews.author: J. Perovich

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE MAT
customer_reviews.text: This is really a comfortable mat. I had a Pro Gel mat for years and liked it, but when I needed a new one I decided to go with this brand. I like it much better. It is soft and cushiony. The Pro Gel turned up on the edges and I was constantly tripping over them. The color choices are better and it's a little wider than my old one. I plan to get another one for the other side of the kitchen and this is the one I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: J.P

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.text: A little too large for most kitchens (including mine) but you can't beat the no-slip design. My mother has one of these and it's lasted her almost 6 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Rittner

customer_reviews.title: This is my fourth one
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet and bad knees. I can stand and cook and wash dishes on my bare feet and I am still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Choi

customer_reviews.title: I love standing for work
customer_reviews.text: I have own this mat since May 2014, it has been folded, moved around a lot and stood on a lot. I currently stand on this mat for 8-9 hours a day at work. I love standing for work, I am a software engineer and standing maintains mental focus and clarity. I do not think I could stand for my entire shift without this mat. Really works and is still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ogden

customer_reviews.title: My feet no longer hurt after standing in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I put this mat in front of the kitchen sink to provide support to my feet when I'm washing dishes. Usually my feet hurt from standing on the hard kitchen floor. But after having this mat in the kitchen, my feet no longer hurt. It's a heavy duty mat. If you stand on it for a while, your feet leave an impression in the mat, but the mat goes back to normal when you're done. To clean it, I just run the mop over it when I mop the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: J&A

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal if you have claws.
customer_reviews.text: Love the mat. Very comfortable to stand on. Two problems have occurred though: 1) Our cats claws puncture the mat and we get little tufts of black material poking through. 2) Surprisingly the mats, though reasonably heavy, do not stay in place on our hardwood floors. We have tried the double sided rug tap and are going to try some anti-skid pads but even with the tape they eventually move.
customer_reviews.author: Alistair J. Windsor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cushioning
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my folks and they absolutely love it. My parents are almost 70 and they spending a lot of their post-retirement time in the kitchen, standing on their feet hours on end can harm their already sensitive joints, so this product definitely alleviates that type of pressure. It's a sturdy and supple comfort mat and the most important fact is that it is comfortable. It seems easy to wipe clean and it maintains its shape.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great mat providing great comfort
customer_reviews.text: I read all the earlier reviews about this mat curling up and all and that is just not true any longer. Sure, it arrives all curled up for shipping but it lies flat and provides a comfortable surface and never curled--sure beats dishwashing and meal preps on a hard ceramic floor! A quick wipe with a soft cloth, no harsh chemicals keeps it clean.
customer_reviews.author: gym rat

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have owned. Very comfortable and looks really nice. I have gotten the grey and brown to match different kitchen floors.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my small kitchen. I like that it lays flat and does not curl up on the ends.
customer_reviews.author: The Reader

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME COMFORT MATS
customer_reviews.text: These mats are AWESOME!! I've had major back surgery and have scoliosis, so I can't stand in place for long without pain. I bought two 6' mats, one for in front of the sink area and across from the sink in front of the cook top. I can now stand longer preparing food and cooking and cleaning up. They are a God send for me! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Lady of Leisure

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: You don't think you need it... but you definitely do! I know what you are thinking, a mat is a mat. That is what I thought until I got this fro my mom as I wanted something that wouldn't curl up and have her trip on it. Once it was in place, not only did I achieve the goal of ends that stay down, but the comfort of standing on it for an extended period of time doing dishes or cutting up veggies... priceless. I ended up getting some for me and couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: JanewayVoyager

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pad for my kitchen. I have a long island in my kitchen and this pad extends the entire length - makes working at the stove and prep station so much more comfortable. It is wide enough to ensure you don't end up half on and half off during normal walking back and forth. I have it on top of a wood floor and it doesn't slide around so that is also very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Ringdahl

customer_reviews.title: Great mat. A little to long for my husband's ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mat. A little to long for my husband's liking in the kitchen so will probably cut in half and use half in the laundry room and half at my ironing board as I am a quilter and the the extra padding will help with my bad knees. Will order another 2-3 mats for the kitchen area.
customer_reviews.author: OBX Quilt Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly effective comfort
customer_reviews.text: Now we pretty much want to cover every walkable surface in the kitchen with this stuff. Awesome product and easy to clean. NEVER let movers bend this in half when changing residences!
customer_reviews.author: JNFoo

customer_reviews.title: It is so comfy to walk on and it looks very nice in the room
customer_reviews.text: My dog has trouble walking across our hardwood floor so I use this as a runner through our dining room. It is so comfy to walk on and it looks very nice in the room. The cinnamon color is mostly brown with a little hint of red. It looks nice with our cherry furniture. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: moogirl0804

customer_reviews.title: If airport floors could feel like this, I'd travel more....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace one of the better-known (or at least more widely advertised, and costly) comfort mats appropriated by my husband for use elsewhere in our home and was surprised to find greater comfort in this one than in its more famous cousin. No regrets! This one runs from our sink to the dishwasher and brings speedy relief to aching knees. If airport floors could be cushioned this way, I'd travel more.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Needed a kitchen mat and appreciate the benefits of anti-fatigue. The mat looks great and is very functional. My only critiques are that it slide a little on our hardwood floors (not enough to be unsafe, only if you kick it), and I do catch a toe on the edge every once in a while. I'd still buy it again, and none of this has caused a safety issue. Just in case the manufacturer reads this (ha, ha), would be nice to have a slightly more rubberized bottom. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Cilla Parkison

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and quality - but wouldn't recommend cinnamon color
customer_reviews.text: Comfort and quality is excellent. My reason for not giving 5 stars is the color - I ordered cinnamon - there is nothing cinnamon about this color - the color is a flat brown - some reviewers said it had a hint of red - I don't see that. If I had to order again, I would probably go with the espresso color. Color not bad enough to return though.
customer_reviews.author: TFA

customer_reviews.title: Aahhh
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice mats. They have really made a difference in the way my feet feel at the end of the day when I'm standing at the kitchen counter making dinner. In fact, they made such a difference, that is ordered one for in front of my workbench as well. I took away one star because the bottoms are not as "grippy" as I would like. They slide just a little too easily. This is definitely not a big deal at all though.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like gel for the kitchen or office
customer_reviews.text: Great gel feeling mats to have for the kitchen, work, or office. Feels like Dr. Scholls on the feet. Good product to buy if you're on the feet all day. Plus the mats are durable and last. Barely no maintainence.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Mirch

customer_reviews.title: Great mat!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS MAT!! I have wood floors and spend a lot of time in the kitchen - sometimes all day - this has made it soooo much easier. Also the price is way better than some that really have bad reviews - very glad I got this one! The company listened to the people that complained about the side edges curling up - mine doesn't. You know you are getting from a good company when they listen!
customer_reviews.author: Big M

customer_reviews.title: Going into my kitchen has become like a foot massage
customer_reviews.text: Going into my kitchen has become like a foot massage. I find reasons to go stand on this mat (in fact, I am right now). Foot bliss disguised as kitchen chores.
customer_reviews.author: Jen OS

customer_reviews.title: I read the reviews which we excellent! I'm glad I chose to take a chance ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a believer! I knew nothing about this product prior to purchasing. All I knew was I needed quality kitchen mats. I read the reviews which we excellent! I'm glad I chose to take a chance on this prime deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific.
customer_reviews.text: The best. Wish there were a multitude of colors, but it is what it is. Love the fact that my wood floor stays dry by the sink, stove and dishwasher. I'm a messy washer and cook. All the drips, drops and splashes in my kitchen are caught on this waterproof mat. It's so easy to clean - spot with a rag, then wet swifter it, when cleaning the kitchen floor.
customer_reviews.author: Saskatoon

customer_reviews.title: easy on your feet and legs
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my kitchen. I bought 2 large mats for the area in front of our sink/stove. I'm pretty spazzy and I have not yet tripped over them - always a bonus ;) If I could improve anything: I would love to find a place that offers custom sizes. I would buy one that properly fills/fits that space. Currently there is a space about 6 inches on either side that I wish was also covered with the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... my second Imprint Kitchen Mat and I have really enjoyed them!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Imprint Kitchen Mat and I have really enjoyed them!
customer_reviews.author: Myrna L. Riley

customer_reviews.title: I have two of these mats myself and love them. I pruchased this one for my mother ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these mats myself and love them. I purchased this one for my mother who is 82 and suffers from back pain. Mom loves this mat and says it has made her want to cook again. Makes the world of difference in the pain level from standing for long periods of time in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: tenn

customer_reviews.title: Gifted Item
customer_reviews.text: The recipients of these comfort mats had high praise for the product. One uses hers in the laundry room and another one uses his in front of a workbench. Since it was one of the "daily specials", the price for the rugs was perfect. They were very well packaged and arrived on the date expected.
customer_reviews.author: Enjoy Learning

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen / work area mat!
customer_reviews.text: We have several in the kitchen and other work areas of our home. Spend the money and pick the size, color and pattern which fits your work area best and you will LOVE these mats. Makes standing a pleasure while doing your household baking, reloading, tool bench, laundry, etc. EASY TO CLEAN
customer_reviews.author: Scott Allen

customer_reviews.title: Sublime Imprint Anti-Fatigue Nantucket Series 20 inch by 72 inch
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mat in my kitchen for over three months and I am completely satisfied with the product. The anti-fatigue mat makes a HUGE difference in comfort level when standing in the food prep area or at the sink. Spills clean easily. The Nantucket design blends in well with the earth tones in the kitchen. We'll never go back to ordinary kitchen "rugs" again. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a similar mat in my kitchen. The length is perfect. It doesn’t shift or slide around. Good price
customer_reviews.author: Heather Franz

customer_reviews.title: Squishy and nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to go with my standing desk. It works really well, feels great, and looks nice in my cubicle!
customer_reviews.author: KtAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for the kitchen to help my husband. Because of physical disability he has to kneel when he is working in the kitchen. We had a rug but it wasn't providing enough comfort for him. This mat is perfect and provides great comfort for anyone standing or kneeling in the kitchen at the sink or dishwasher. It definitely relieves pain from standing in one place for a period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Stickle

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I love these mats! They are comfortable but firm. The support they give to your legs and back is a necessity if you spend a lot of time standing in one spot for very long. On the weekend, I am in my kitchen for hours at a time and appreciate the comfort I get from these mats. They are easy to keep clean and spills wipe right up. I am going to buy another one for my laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: lisa everhart

customer_reviews.title: No creases
customer_reviews.text: No wrinkles or creases like others reported. Rolled out and looks great! Also got a smaller one that was 3/4" thick vs the 5/8" thickness of these. Just FYI that fraction of an inch made a major difference in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: cindy grant

customer_reviews.title: Great Matt to have by the sink.
customer_reviews.text: Now that we have it for over a year, I can say this Comfort Mat is great. It feels good standing on the Matt, bare foot even better. East to keep clean .... after a year, it still look new as first purchased. Good value, and the Mocha color is nice. Will buy a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this mat because the "name brand" one was a little out of my price range. I can't imagine that the other popular mat could be any better than this. It is so nice to be standing at my kitchen counter during long chopping episodes and not have my back go out for the rest of the day. If you are on the fence just know that this is a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Barksdale

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY FEET
customer_reviews.text: These are very high quality, I am so happy with the mat, except for the color. One of the reviews stated that it is a reddish brown, not mine. Mine is the chocolate brown, there is no red in it. I did not know how much it helped my feet & legs until yesterday. I would like to exchange it for the right color.
customer_reviews.author: Secondhand rose

customer_reviews.title: this mat is miles better than the ones I have bought at Kohls
customer_reviews.text: this mat is miles better than the ones I have bought at Kohls. And it's guaranteed for 7 years. What's not to like.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bundy

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh!
customer_reviews.text: We had been buying other cushioned mats but none held up or was as comfortable is this one. Wish we'd found this one before wasting money on inferior brands. It is heavy duty adn easy to clean. IT is thick, so you may have a learning curve to teach yourself not to trip on it at first. We got over that quickly and don't even notice it now - except for the vast comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer in Kentucky

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest thing for the kitchen. My heals hurt on our worn out floor, but this mat makes me want to be in the kitchen longer. I can't wait to roll out pasta this summer, knowing that my heals won't ache after I'm done. Thank you so much. I would definitely tell everyone, & I do when they walk through my kitchen. Since I work from home, I have to brag & have everyone stand on it for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Falatic

customer_reviews.title: 1/3 with a quality problem
customer_reviews.text: Great product - but of the 3 I ordered 1 of them has deep lines in it that are not lifting out after over a month on the floor. Unfortunately, they have a 30 day return policy - will write customer service and see what they say.
customer_reviews.author: Betsey L. Walters

customer_reviews.title: It would be great for short periods of standing
customer_reviews.text: I should have got the industrial version of this. It would be great for short periods of standing, but not for a whole day of working at my standing desk, like 9 to 13 hours, it flattens out really fast and you have to move your feet to a different spot every few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a comfortable, sturdy and good looking kitchen mat, this is the one.
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews often but after owning this mat for over a year now, we are still really impressed with it and felt we should let other potential customers about it. It still looks and functions just like it did when we got it and we couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & doesn't show water drops.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mat for a couple months now. I placed it in front of kitchen sink. It's very comfortable, doesn't slip or slide. The color is nice & I love that it dries smooth with no marks or residue from splashes from doing dishes.
customer_reviews.author: A. McMillen

customer_reviews.title: My mother loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My aging mother got this as a Christmas gift for her kitchen. She loves that it matches her floor tile. She also says that it is easy to clean and makes a real difference in the back pain she gets when on her feet for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Knight

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one!!! I LOVE the quality, feel, and look of these mats so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: JVGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mat. I like that it's as long as it is, that works nicely in my smaller kitchen because it sits in front of most of my counter space and my sink. At first I thought it was too hard and wouldn't provide that much relief when standing for long periods, but it's actually perfect.
customer_reviews.author: T. Vrba

customer_reviews.title: Try this mat
customer_reviews.text: I looked at more expensive mats but settled on this one. It looks great. Good quality leather appeal. I got the dark brown chocolate & it is very deep, like a Hershey bar. I have some leg pain, if I stand too long & this helps absorb hardness of tile floor. If you have real leg pain issues, then you can spend more I guess. But I recommend you try this first.
customer_reviews.author: HappygoLucky

customer_reviews.title: I would put these all over my house if I could
customer_reviews.text: We're has this been my whole life? This pad is a must have for anyone that spends a lot of time in kitchen. I would seriously have these all I've my house if my husband would let me, but for now I only have the one where I stand to cook/wash dishes. Great product, seems really durable, and cleans really nicley.
customer_reviews.author: MsFancyPantz

customer_reviews.title: Firmer than my other mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat is firm to stand on, not squishy at all and not as soft as my gel mat. It was a gift from my husband, which explains the awful color. I would not recommend the flatiron color. It looks terrible in my kitchen, but my hubby can't tell the difference. So, I'll live with it. The nasty color is not the product's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Q

customer_reviews.title: Imprint Cumulus Mat
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I have purchased recently because the first one was great. It makes a difference when I use the mats. I have one in front of the stove and the other one in front of the sink. This was money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Marie H.

customer_reviews.title: My feet never hit the floor!!
customer_reviews.text: My feet never feel the hard tile floor. Other mats I tried out in stores, within a few seconds I could feel the hard floor with my heel. Not the Imprint comfort mat Nantucket brand. I am so happy with the two in front of the sink and my center isle, I will order more for in front of the stove and frig.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: No brainer!
customer_reviews.text: As many reviewers have already noted, this is a very very good product. We have now used it for a few months and we are delighted by it. It is super comfortable, stays in place and is very easy to use. Wish everything was made this well!
customer_reviews.author: A-customer

customer_reviews.title: Cushioned mat with no drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: Have just bought a second mat after having another for six months. These provide an amazing amount of cushioning, stay in place, are easy to clean, don't curl at the edge, and do their job effectively.
customer_reviews.author: abycats

customer_reviews.title: These mats are wonderful for in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: These mats are wonderful for in the kitchen. I've had mine for over two years now and it looks brand new. Initially I was concerned that it might crack since is seemed to comfy, but that is no longer a concern. We have a dog in the house too, and there are no nail scratches. Very durable. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Clark

customer_reviews.title: Sublime Imprint Comfort Mat
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my small kitchen and it is a perfect fit. It has a pattern, is easy to clean, and is very comfortable when cooking for any length of time. Thus far it appears to be strong and resilient. I have accidentally walked on this mat with high heels (by mistake) and it has survived. I have only had it for ~1 month so we'll see how it survives long-term. So far, very good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: Not like the $29.99 you see sold as a "comfort" mat in stores. It has a real gel like feel and the seams around the edge are very well cut and finished with no "wavy" effect. I'm glad I chose a more expensive mat without the buying a cheaper one first. Once you have one of these most you'll feel a huge difference. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: J. King

product_meta.title: Imprint Cumulus9 Kitchen Mat Nantucket Series 20 in. x 36 in. x 5/8 in. Flatiron
product_meta.description: Size:20 in. x 36 in. x 0.6 in.| Color:FlatironSink your feet into the Imprint® Cumulus9™ Comfort Mat with its proprietary Multi-Core Technology. Feel how it conforms to the shape of your feet and supports your arches for relief of back, leg and foot discomfort. The advantage is its proprietary multilayer cushioning system. The soft, upper layer luxuriously cushions your feet while the firm, lower layer provides soothing support. You’ll want an Imprint® Comfort Mat everywhere you work and stand – kitchen, laundry, bathroom, garage, workshop and more!
feature_bullets: Top Consumer Rated Comfort Mat - Up to 60% thicker than other mats!, non-toxic & phthalate free, Safe for children and pets
University tested and proven by the Center for Ergonomics to reduce overall fatigue and discomfort by up to 60%
No-curl edges and stay-flat memory ensure Imprint Mats won't curl like other mats. Tested and certified by the National Floor Safety Institute & an American Chiropractic Association (ACA) Partner.
REAL reviews by REAL customers: We do not pay third party review companies to influence our reviewers like many of our competitors. Honest and unbiased reviews.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,024 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
